product_name: SunCloud Empress Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Boasting sleek style and protective lenses that shield your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays, the SunCloud Empress Polarized sunglasses will have you feeling like a queen every time the sun shines. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. SunCloud Empress polarized sunglasses are designed to fit medium sized faces. Closeout.
short_description: Boasting sleek style and protective lenses that shield your eyes from glare and harmful UV rays, the SunCloud Empress Polarized sunglasses will have you feeling like a queen every time the sun shines.
